org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface EnderCrystalPlatform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Populator

    public interface EnderCrystalPlatform
extends Populator
    Represents a populator which randomly generates large obsidian pillars with EnderCrystals at the peak such as are found in the End.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EnderCrystalPlatform.Builder
      A builder for constructing EnderCrystalPlatform populators.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpawnChance

        int getSpawnChance()
        Gets the chance of a pillar spawning in a chunk. The default value is 5 (therefore equating to a 20% chance or 1 in 5).
        Returns:
        The spawn chance

      • setSpawnChance

        void setSpawnChance(int chance)
        Sets the chance of a pillar spawning in a chunk. The default value is 5 (therefore equating to a 20% chance or 1 in 5).
        Parameters:
        chance - The spawn chance

      • getBaseHeight

        int getBaseHeight()
        Gets the base height of the pillar.
        Returns:
        The base height

      • setBaseHeight

        void setBaseHeight(int height)
        Sets the base height of the pillar.
        Parameters:
        height - The new base height

      • getHeightVariance

        int getHeightVariance()
        Gets the height variance of the pillar. The final height will be the base height plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Returns:
        The height variance

      • setHeightVariance

        void setHeightVariance(int variance)
        Sets the height variance of the pillar. The final height will be the base height plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new height variance

      • getBaseRadius

        int getBaseRadius()
        Gets the base radius of the pillar.
        Returns:
        The base radius

      • setBaseRadius

        void setBaseRadius(int radius)
        Sets the base radius of the pillar.
        Parameters:
        radius - The new base radius

      • getRadiusVariance

        int getRadiusVariance()
        Gets the radius variance of the pillar. The final radius will be the base radius plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Returns:
        The radius variance

      • setRadiusVariance

        void setRadiusVariance(int variance)
        Sets the radius variance of the pillar. The final radius will be the base radius plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new radius variance
